name: New Super Realistic Mario Bros.
storyline: It starts off as a regular old Mario game, but remastered in some ways! But you can't hit blocks, and your path is blocked by huge pipes? Everything has dissapeared, and a weird glitchy mushroom appears... Mario decides to eat it, and the game crashes! And you are transported to the "rEaL wOrLd", playing as "Depressio", a depressed plumber who looks kinda like Mario... Choose your paths to different endings!
summary:
New Super Realistic Mario Bros is a kind of creepypasta game but not really?
It starts off normally, like a classic Super Mario Game, but suddenly, it acts weirdly...
